name: Before Sunrise Reflections
description:
Art can mean many things to different people. The duality of this piece is intentional. Is it a seascape or a body or both.

The warm colors before sunrise reflected off the surface of the sea. Ships in the distance blurred on the horizon on their way down the Channel to distant lands.

I live by the sea and wake early to go out and see the sunrise. The sky is best before the sunrises, if there are clouds then the light reflects off them in many colours and the sea is dark in some areas. 

The variety and beauty of the pre-sunrise morning is glorious and abundant.

I love painting the sea in watercolors and using wood panels instead of paper has brought a whole new dimension to the paintings.
